Package
Description
ca.gc.cra.radar.api
Command-line entry points for RADAR capture, live, assemble, and poster workflows.
ca.gc.cra.radar.api.tools
Auxiliary CLI tooling for RADAR operators (e.g., segment introspection utilities).
